import React, { useState } from 'react' import './user-address.css' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' import { userAddressSchema } from '../../validation/formValidation' import axios from '../../axios' function UserAddress(props) { console.log(props.cart); // const [i ,seti] =useState() const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [userAddress,setUserAddress] = useState('') const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(userAddressSchema) }) const handleButtonClick = () => { setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen); }; const addressSubmit = (address) => { console.log(address); const token= localStorage.getItem('token') axios.post('/users/update-address',{address},{ headers:{ Authorization:`Bearer ${token}` } }).then((response)=>{ console.log(response.data.userAddress); setTimeout(()=>{ handleButtonClick() setIsLoading(!isLoading) },2000) setUserAddress(response.data.userAddress) }).catch(()=>{ }) } return ( <> {props.cart == true ?
